ps1

类 AddressBook

  • java.lang.Object
    • ps1.AddressBook

  • public class AddressBook
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an implementation of a small address book. Each entry contains the following information:
    • Name
    • Postal Address
    • Phone Number
    • Email Address
    • Note

    This address book supports many methods including:

    • Add an entry to the address book
    • Search entries by key in any of the fields
    • Remove
    • Save the address book to a file
    • Read saved address book from a file
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Guang Yang

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      AddressBook()
      Create a empty address book.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • AddressBook

        public AddressBook()
        Create a empty address book.

    • 方法详细资料

      • AddEntry

        public void AddEntry(java.lang.String Name,
                     java.lang.String Postal,
                     java.lang.String Phone,
                     java.lang.String Email,
                     java.lang.String Note)
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Add an contact entry to the address book. The parameters contain Name, Postal Address, Phone number, Email Address and small note. The Name is required, the others can be left null.
        参数:
        Name - name of the contact, required
        Postal - postal address of the contact, leave it null if not specified
        Phone - phone number of the contact, leave it null if not specified
        Email - email address of the contact, leave it null if not specified
        Note - note of the contact, leave it null if not specified
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If Name is null, or Postal Address, Phone Number, Email Address has invalid format.

      • RemoveEntry

        public void RemoveEntry(java.lang.String key)
        Remove the entries which contain the key in any of their fields.
        参数:
        key - the string used for removing
        另请参阅:
        Entry

      • SearchEntry

        public java.util.List<ps1.Entry> SearchEntry(java.lang.String key)
        Search the entries which contain the key in any of their fields, and return a list of them.
        参数:
        key - the string used for search
        返回:
        the result entries as a list
        另请参阅:
        Entry

      • SaveToFile

        public void SaveToFile(java.lang.String filename)
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       org.json.JSONException
        Save the address book to a file using JSON style.
        参数:
        filename - the file name used for writing
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - If there's something wrong with the writing to the file.
        org.json.JSONException - Fail to convert some entries to JSON.

      • ReadFromFile

        public void ReadFromFile(java.lang.String filename)
                  throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                         java.io.IOException
        Read saved address book from a file, if this file wasn't created by SaveToFile function, it will throw an exception.

        This method will append the contact list read from the file to the current address book, and won't eliminate the redundancy.

        参数:
        filename - the file name used for reading
        抛出:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If file is null, or invalid filename
        java.io.IOException - If this file wasn't created by SaveToFile function or some other reading issues

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Return a string representation of the entries in the address book.
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 java.lang.Object
        返回:
        a string representation of the address book
        另请参阅:
        Entry
